dcterms:creator: Yuhao Kang
Song Gao
Yunlei Liang
Mingxiao Li
Jake Kruse
dcterms:description: The COVID-19 dataset captures the daily COVID-19 trends of U.S. states from April 12, 2020, to December 31, 2020. It includes daily counts of confirmed cases, deaths, recovered cases, active cases, incident rate, mortality rate, and testing rate, along with dynamic edges representing daily population flows among states and state-level COVID-19 policies as treatments.
dcterms:title: COVID-19 Dataset

dcterms:creator: Changran Geng
Harald Paganetti
Clemens Grassberger
dcterms:description: The Tumor Growth dataset describes the tumor growth dynamics in different regions of patients suffering from non-small cell lung cancer, where patients may receive differing treatments. The dataset models the evolution of tumors under the combined effects of chemotherapy and radiotherapy.
dcterms:title: Tumor Growth Dataset
